title: Ziegfeld Girl  (Romantic Drama 1941)  James Stewart, Judy Garlan
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0034415/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0034415/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1</a>



A fairly good quality Black & White film.


Language............: English
Subtitles...........: English
Runtime.............: 132 mim.
Resolution..........: 352 x 256


Storyline:

Discovery by Flo Ziegfeld changes a girl's life, but not necessarily for the better. Three beautiful women find this out the hard way when they join the spectacle on Broadway: 

Susan, the singer who must leave behind her ageing vaudevillian father;
	
Sheila, the vulnerable working girl pursued both by a millionaire and by her loyal boyfriend from Flatbush;
	
Sandra, the mysterious European beauty  whose concert violinist husband cannot endure the thought of their escaping from poverty by promenading her glamor in skimpy costumes.
